This update includes chain metadata and: This update includes chain metadata and chain properties.
A controller account should not be set t: A controller account should not be set to manage multiple stashes. The selected controller is already controlling {{stashId}}
A controller account should not map to a: A controller account should not map to another stash. This selected controller is a stash, controlled by {{bondedId}}
A deposit paid by the proxied account th: A deposit paid by the proxied account that can not be used while the proxy is in existence. The deposit is returned when the proxy is destroyed. The amount reserved is based on the base deposit and number of proxies
Accounts injected from any of these exte: Accounts injected from any of these extensions will appear in this application and be available for use. The above list is updated as more extensions with external signing capability become available.
All rewards will go towards the selected: All rewards will go towards the selected output destination when a payout is made.
All the listed validators and all their: All the listed validators and all their nominators will receive their rewards.
An encrypted backup file will be created: An encrypted backup file will be created once you have pressed the "Download" button. This can be used to re-import your account on any other machine.
Any account can request payout for stake: Any account can request payout for stakers, this is not limited to accounts that will be rewarded.
Any account set as proxy will be able to: Any account set as proxy will be able to perform actions in place of the proxied account
Any democracy vote performed by the dele: Any democracy vote performed by the delegated account will result in an additional vote from the delegating account
As such it is recommended that you setup: As such it is recommended that you setup a proxy to control operations via the stash.
Consider storing your account in a signe: Consider storing your account in a signer such as a browser extension, hardware device, QR-capable phone wallet (non-connected) or desktop application for optimal account security.
Create a backup file for this account: Create a backup file for this account
Derivation for Ledger-type accounts are: Derivation for Ledger-type accounts are only available on mnemonic seeds.
Distinct stash and controller accounts a: Distinct stash and controller accounts are recommended to ensure fund security. You will be allowed to make the transaction, but take care to not tie up all funds, only use a portion of the available funds during this period.
Ensure that the extension has accounts,: Ensure that the extension has accounts, some accounts are visible globally and available for this chain and that you gave the application permission to access accounts from the extension to use them.
Ensure that you utilized the \"Save\" fu: Ensure that you utilized the "Save" functionality before using a generated address to receive funds. Without saving the address and the associated seed any funds sent to it will be lost.
Ensure you are using a strong password f: Ensure you are using a strong password for proper account protection.
For approvals outstanding approvers will: For approvals outstanding approvers will be shown, for hashes that should be cancelled the first approver is required.
For fund security, your session key shou: For fund security, your session key should not match your stash key.
Future versions of the web-only interfac: Future versions of the web-only interface will drop support for non-external accounts, much like the IPFS version.
I have saved my mnemonic seed safely: I have saved my mnemonic seed safely
If the delegated account is currently vo: If the delegated account is currently voting in a referendum, the delegating vote and conviction will be added.
If you add several proxy accounts for th: If you add several proxy accounts for the same proxy type (e.g 2 accounts set as proxy for Governance), then any of those 2 accounts will be able to perform governance actions on behalf of the proxied account
If you are moving accounts between appli: If you are moving accounts between applications, ensure that you use the correct type.
If you have not claimed rewards straight: If you have not claimed rewards straight after the end of the era, the validator is in the active set and you are seeing no rewards, this would mean that the reward payout transaction was made by another account on your behalf. Always check your favorite explorer to see any historic payouts made to your accounts.
It is recommended that you create/store: It is recommended that you create/store your accounts securely and externally from the app. On {{yourBrowser}} the following browser extensions are available for use -
Multisig message with call (for final ap: Multisig message with call (for final approval)
No funds staked yet. Bond funds to valid: No funds staked yet. Bond funds to validate or nominate a validator
No pending payouts for your stashes: No pending payouts for your stashes
No pending payouts for your validators: No pending payouts for your validators
Nominators can be selected manually from: Nominators can be selected manually from the list of all currently available validators.
Not participating in any pools. Join a p: Not participating in any pools. Join a pool first.
Once bonded, it will need to be unlocked: Once bonded, it will need to be unlocked/withdrawn and will be locked for at least the bonding duration.
Once transmitted the new selection will: Once transmitted the new selection will only take effect in 2 eras since the selection criteria for the next era was done at the end of the previous era. Until then, the nominations will show as inactive.
Once transmitted the new selection will only take effect in 2 eras taking the new validator election cycle into account. Until then, the nominations will show as inactive.
One of your available nomination account: One of your available nomination accounts, keyed by the stash. The transaction will be sent from the controller.
One or more extensions are detected in y: One or more extensions are detected in your browser, however no accounts has been injected.
Password are ignored for hex seed: Password are ignored for hex seed
Payouts of rewards for a validator can b: Payouts of rewards for a validator can be initiated by any account. This means that as soon as a validator or nominator requests a payout for an era, all the nominators for that validator will be rewarded. Each user does not need to claim individually and the suggestion is that validators should claim rewards for everybody as soon as an era ends.
Please make sure to save this file in a: Please make sure to save this file in a secure location as it is required, together with your password, to restore your account.
Provide the account QR from the module/e: Provide the account QR from the module/external application for scanning. Once detected as valid, you will be taken to the next step to add the account to your list.
Proxied account has no owned proxies: Proxied account has no owned proxies
Retrieving all available bags, this will: Retrieving all available bags, this will take some time
Retrieving info for the selected eras, t: Retrieving info for the selected eras, this will take some time
Rewards (once paid) can be deposited to: Rewards (once paid) can be deposited to either the stash or controller, with different effects.
Save this backup file in a secure locati: Save this backup file in a secure location. Additionally, the password associated with this account is needed together with this backup file in order to restore your account.
Since some extensions, such as the polka: Since some extensions, such as the polkadot-js extension, protects you against all community reported phishing sites, there are valid reasons to use them for additional protection, even if you are not storing accounts in it.
Since the multisig function like any oth: Since the multisig function like any other account, once created it is available for selection anywhere accounts are used and needs to be funded before use.
Since this transaction deals with fundin: Since this transaction deals with funding, the stash account will be used.
Soft derivation paths are not allowed on: Soft derivation paths are not allowed on ed25519
Stash account (do not increase the amoun: Stash account (do not increase the amount at stake)
Stash account (increase the amount at st: Stash account (increase the amount at stake)
Supply a JSON file with the list of sign: Supply a JSON file with the list of signatories.
Supply a backed-up JSON file, encrypted: Supply a backed-up JSON file, encrypted with your account-specific password.
Swap to a non-executing approval type, w: Swap to a non-executing approval type, with subsequent calls providing the actual call data.
The All bags list is composed of bags th: The All bags list is composed of bags that each describe a range of active bonded funds of the nominators. In each bag is a list of nodes that correspond to a nominator and their staked funds.
The Threshold must be a positive number: The Threshold must be a positive number
The UI puts a limit of 40 payouts at a t: The UI puts a limit of 40 payouts at a time, where each payout is a single validator for a single era.
The account that will join the pool.
The account that will submit the rebag t: The account that will submit the rebag transaction.
The account type that you wish to create: The account type that you wish to create. This is the top-level derivation.
The accounts that will be rebagged as a: The accounts that will be rebagged as a result of this operation.
The address index on the account that yo: The address index on the account that you wish to add. This is the second-level derivation.
The address that has previously setup a: The address that has previously setup a proxy to one of the accounts that you control.
The amount placed at-stake should allow: The amount placed at-stake should allow some free funds for future transactions.
The amount placed at-stake should not be: The amount placed at-stake should not be your full available amount to allow for transaction fees.
The amount the is to be rebonded from th: The amount the is to be rebonded from the value currently unlocking, i.e. previously unbonded
The amount to allocate and the convictio: The amount to allocate and the conviction that will be applied to all votes made on a referendum.
The amount to unbond. It should be less: The amount to unbond. It should be less or equal to the full bonded amount.
The bonded amount is less than the curre: The bonded amount is less than the current active minimum nominated amount of {{minNomination}} and depending on the network state, may not be selected to participate
The bonded amount is less than the minim: The bonded amount is less than the minimum bond amount of {{existentialDeposit}}
The bonded amount is less than the minimum threshold of {{minBond}} for nominators
The bonded amount is less than the minimum threshold of {{minBond}} for validators
The call data for this transaction match: The call data for this transaction matching the hash. Once sent, the multisig will be executed against this.
The call hash from the list of available: The call hash from the list of available and unapproved calls.
The commission is below the on-chain min: The commission is below the on-chain minimum of {{p}}%
The commission is deducted from all rewa: The commission is deducted from all rewards before the remainder is split with nominators.
The controller does not have sufficient: The controller does not have sufficient funds available to cover transaction fees. Ensure that a funded controller is used.
The creator for this multisig call: The creator for this multisig call
The current approvals applied to this mu: The current approvals applied to this multisig
The derivation path allows you to create: The derivation path allows you to create different accounts from the same base mnemonic.
The derivation path is only relevant whe: The derivation path is only relevant when deriving keys from a mnemonic.
The derivation will be constructed from: The derivation will be constructed from the values you specify.
The existing account password as specifi: The existing account password as specified when this account was created or when it was last changed.
The funds will only be available for wit: The funds will only be available for withdrawal after the unbonding period, however will not be part of the staked amount after the next validator election. You can follow the unlock countdown in the UI.
The genesisHash for the scanned account: The genesisHash for the scanned account does not match the genesisHash of the connected chain. The account will not be usable on this chain.
The helpers should be able to verify, vi: The helpers should be able to verify, via an off-chain mechanism, that the account owner indeed wishes to recover access and as such provide any approvals. In the cases of malicious recovery procedures, they will have the power to stop it.
The hex output from author_rotateKeys, a: The hex output from author_rotateKeys, as executed on the validator node. The keys will show as pending until applied at the start of a new session.
The id that will be assigned to this nom: The id that will be assigned to this nomination pool.
The initial value to assign to the pool. It is set to the maximum of the minimum bond and the minium nomination value.
The initial value to assign to the pool. It is set to the minimum value required to join a pool.
The key type and crypto type to use for: The key type and crypto type to use for this key. Be aware that different keys have different crypto requirements. You should be familiar with the type requirements for the different keys.
The local name for this account. Changin: The local name for this account. Changing this does not affect your on-line identity, so this is only used to indicate the name of the account locally.
The maximum amount you can delegate is t: The maximum amount you can delegate is the amount of funds available on the delegating account.
The metadata description to set for this: The metadata description to set for this pool
The name for this account and how it wil: The name for this account and how it will appear under your addresses. With an on-chain identity, it can be made available to others.
The name for this account as it will app: The name for this account as it will appear under your accounts.
The name is for unique identification of: The name is for unique identification of the account in your owner lists.
The network from which this account was: The network from which this account was originally generated is different than the network you are currently connected to. Once imported ensure you toggle the "allow on any network" option for the account to keep it visible on the current network.
The operation type to apply. For approva: The operation type to apply. For approvals both non-final and final approvals are supported.
The origin account will also be set as t: The origin account will also be set as the pool admin, nominator and state toggler.
The password and password confirmation f: The password and password confirmation for this account. This is required to authenticate any transactions made and to encrypt the keypair.
The password previously used to encrypt: The password previously used to encrypt this account.
The pool and pool member that is to be a: The pool and pool member that is to be affected. The transaction will be sent from the associated pool member account.
The recoverable account is protected aga: The recoverable account is protected against the loss of seed/access by a social process.
The secret seed value for this account. Ensure that you keep this in a safe place, with access to the seed you can re-create the account.
The seed and derivation path will be sub: The seed and derivation path will be submitted to the validator node. this is an advanced operation, only to be performed when you are sure of the security and connection risks.
The selected controller tied to this sta: The selected controller tied to this stash. Once set, this account will be able to control the actions performed by the stash account.
The selected destination account does no: The selected destination account does not exist and cannot be used to receive rewards
The selected validators to nominate, eit: The selected validators to nominate, either via the "currently best algorithm" or via a manual selection.
The signatories has the ability to creat: The signatories has the ability to create transactions using the multisig and approve transactions sent by others.Once the threshold is reached with approvals, the multisig transaction is enacted on-chain.
The specified value is large and may not: The specified value is large and may not allow enough funds to pay future transaction fees.
The stash account that is used. This wil: The stash account that is used. This will allow the controller to perform all non-funds related operations on behalf of the account.
The stash should be treated as a cold wa: The stash should be treated as a cold wallet.
The stash that is to be affected.
The stash that is to be affected. The tr: The stash that is to be affected. The transaction will be sent from the associated controller account.
The threshold for approval should be les: The threshold for approval should be less or equal to the number of signatories for this multisig.
The threshold for approvals and the dela: The threshold for approvals and the delay is the protection associated with the account. The delay should be such that any colluding recovery attempts does have a window to stop.
The validator can block any new nominati: The validator can block any new nominations. By default it is set to allow all nominations.
There is currently an ongoing election f: There is currently an ongoing election for new validator candidates. As such staking operations are not permitted.
These are trusted individuals that can v: These are trusted individuals that can verify and approve any recovery actions. With recovery, once the threshold is reached, the funds associated with the account can be moved to a new destination.
Think of the stash as your cold wallet a: Think of the stash as your cold wallet and the controller as your hot wallet. Funding operations are controlled by the stash, any other non-funding actions by the controller itself.
This account has a governance delegation: This account has a governance delegation
This account has a proxy set: This account has a proxy set
This account is available on all network: This account is available on all networks. It is recommended to link to a specific network via the account options ("only this network" option) to limit availability. For accounts from an extension, set the network on the extension.
This account is recoverable, with the fo: This account is recoverable, with the following friends:
This could mean your nomination has not: This could mean your nomination has not been applied to any validator in the active set by the election algorithm or it has been applied against a validator who is either oversubscribed or chilled.
This does not send any transaction, rath: This does not send any transaction, rather it only sets the genesis in the account JSON.
This is a development account derived fr: This is a development account derived from the known development seed. Do not use for any funds on a non-development network.
This is an invalid derivation path.
This operation will submit the seed via: This operation will submit the seed via an RPC call. Do not perform this operation on a public RPC node, but ensure that the node is local, connected to your validator and secure.
This pubic key is what will be visible i: This pubic key is what will be visible in your queued keys list. It is generated based on the seed and the crypto used.
This will apply to any future use of thi: This will apply to any future use of this account as stored on this browser. Ensure that you securely store this new password and that it is strong and unique to the account.
To ensure optimal fund security using th: To ensure optimal fund security using the same stash/controller is strongly discouraged, but not forbidden.
Use the account actions to create a new: Use the account actions to create a new validator/nominator stash and bond it to participate in staking. Do not send funds directly via a transfer to a validator.
We will provide you with a generated bac: We will provide you with a generated backup file after your account is created. As long as you have access to your account you can always download this file later by clicking on "Backup" button from the Accounts section.
Within the context of a single bag, node: Within the context of a single bag, nodes are not sorted by their stake, but instead placed in insertion order. In other words, the most recently inserted node will be the last node in the bag, regardless of stake. Events like staking rewards or slashes do not automatically put you in a different bag. The bags-list pallet comes with an important permissionless extrinsic: rebag. This allows anyone to specify another account that is in the wrong bag, and place it in the correct one.
You can either bond a specific amount fr: You can either bond a specific amount from your free balance, or all of the accumulated rewards.
You don't have any accounts. Some featur: You don't have any accounts. Some features are currently hidden and will only become available once you have accounts.
You have 1 extension that needs to be up: You have 1 extension that needs to be updated with the latest chain properties in order to display the correct information for the chain you are connected to.
You have {{claimCount}} accounts that ne: You have {{claimCount}} accounts that need attestations. Use the Claim Tokens app on the navigation bar to complete the process. Until you do, your balances for those accounts will not be reflected.
You have {{upgradableCount}} extensions: You have {{upgradableCount}} extensions that need to be updated with the latest chain properties in order to display the correct information for the chain you are connected to.
You should not setup proxies to act as a: You should not setup proxies to act as a self-proxy.
You should trust your nominations to act: You should trust your nominations to act competently and honest; basing your decision purely on their current profitability could lead to reduced profits or even loss of funds.
You will remove any delegation made by t: You will remove any delegation made by this acccount
Your bonded amount is below the on-chain: Your bonded amount is below the on-chain minimum threshold of {{minBond}} and may be chilled. Bond extra funds to increase the bonded amount.
Your password contains at least one \"/\: Your password contains at least one "/" character. Disregard this warning if it is intended.
creator: creator
filter by name, address or index: filter by name, address or index
name: name
the stash account to nominate with: the stash account to nominate with
